00009 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_POD_HPP_INCLUDED
00010 #define BOOST_TT_IS_POD_HPP_INCLUDED
00011 
00012 #include "boost/type_traits/config.hpp"
00013 #include "boost/type_traits/is_void.hpp"
00014 #include "boost/type_traits/is_scalar.hpp"
00015 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_or.hpp"
00016 #include "boost/type_traits/intrinsics.hpp"
00017 
00018 #include <cstddef>
00019 
00020 // should be the last #include
00021 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00022 
00023 namespace boost {
00024 
00025 // forward declaration, needed by 'is_pod_array_helper' template below
00026 template< typename T > struct is_POD;
00027 
00028 namespace detail {
00029 
00030 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00031 
00032 template <typename T> struct is_pod_impl
00033 { 
00034     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00035         bool, value =
00036         (::boost::type_traits::ice_or<
00037             ::boost::is_scalar<T>::value,
00038             ::boost::is_void<T>::value,
00039             BOOST_IS_POD(T)
00040          >::value));
00041 };
00042 
00043 #if !defined(BOOST_NO_ARRAY_TYPE_SPECIALIZATIONS)
00044 template <typename T, std::size_t sz>
00045 struct is_pod_impl<T[sz]>
00046     : is_pod_impl<T>
00047 {
00048 };
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 #else
00052 
00053 template <bool is_array = false>
00054 struct is_pod_helper
00055 {
00056     template <typename T> struct result_
00057     {
00058         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00059             bool, value =
00060             (::boost::type_traits::ice_or<
00061                 ::boost::is_scalar<T>::value,
00062                 ::boost::is_void<T>::value,
00063                 BOOST_IS_POD(T)
00064             >::value));
00065     };
00066 };
00067 
00068 template <bool b>
00069 struct bool_to_yes_no_type
00070 {
00071     typedef ::boost::type_traits::no_type type;
00072 };
00073 
00074 template <>
00075 struct bool_to_yes_no_type<true>
00076 {
00077     typedef ::boost::type_traits::yes_type type;
00078 };
00079 
00080 template <typename ArrayType>
00081 struct is_pod_array_helper
00082 {
00083     enum { is_pod = ::boost::is_POD<ArrayType>::value }; // MSVC workaround
00084     typedef typename bool_to_yes_no_type<is_pod>::type type;
00085     type instance() const;
00086 };
00087 
00088 template <typename T>
00089 is_pod_array_helper<T> is_POD_array(T*);
00090 
00091 template <>
00092 struct is_pod_helper<true>
00093 {
00094     template <typename T> struct result_
00095     {
00096         static T& help();
00097         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value =
00098             sizeof(is_POD_array(help()).instance()) == sizeof(::boost::type_traits::yes_type)
00099             );
00100     };
00101 };
00102 
00103 
00104 template <typename T> struct is_pod_impl
00105 { 
00106    BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00107        bool, value = (
00108            ::boost::detail::is_pod_helper<
00109               ::boost::is_array<T>::value
00110            >::template result_<T>::value
00111            )
00112        );
00113 };
00114 
00115 #endif // BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00116 
00117 // the following help compilers without partial specialization support:
00118 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_pod,void,true)
00119 
00120 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CV_VOID_SPECIALIZATIONS
00121 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_pod,void const,true)
00122 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_pod,void volatile,true)
00123 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_pod,void const volatile,true)
00124 #endif
00125 
00126 } // namespace detail
00127 
00128 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_POD,T,::boost::detail::is_pod_impl<T>::value)
00129 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_pod,T,::boost::detail::is_pod_impl<T>::value)
00130 
00131 } // namespace boost
